an5.74:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.74:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.74:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hotī”ti?
an5.74:5.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ;
an5.74:5.3: uttari cassa paññāya atthaṃ nappajānāti.
an5.74:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ deseti, uttari cassa paññāya atthaṃ nappajānāti.
an5.74:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena sajjhāyaṃ karoti, uttari cassa paññāya atthaṃ nappajānāti.
an5.74:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati, uttari cassa paññāya atthaṃ nappajānāti.
an5.74:9.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ;
an5.74:9.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
an5.74:10.1: Iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayā pariyattibahulo, desito paññattibahulo, desito sajjhāyabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihārī.
an5.74:10.2: Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
an5.74:10.4: Jhāyatha bhikkhu, mā pamādattha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha.
